scripts.e2e:cypress: npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env mock=true --config video=false
scripts.delete:reports: rm -rf mochawesome-report mochawesome-reports junit-report junit-reports || true
scripts.poste2e: npm run combine:junit && npm run combine:mochawesome
scripts.combine:junit: mkdir junit-report || true && jrm junit-report/junit.xml junit-reports/*.xml && rm -rf junit-reports
scripts.combine:mochawesome: mkdir mochawesome-report || true && mochawesome-merge mochawesome-reports/*.json > mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json && marge mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json && rm -rf mochawesome-reports
